todos.text:
The dcli error is a bug where hook paths are resolved relative to the config root instead of the module directory. The path in modules/webapps/module.yaml is
  scripts/create-webapps.sh (correct convention), but dcli looks for /home/dylan/.config/arch-config/scripts/create-webapps.sh instead of
  /home/dylan/.config/arch-config/modules/webapps/scripts/create-webapps.sh.

  You may want to report this at https://gitlab.com/theblackdon/dcli.
ask to make the cli hook execute individually and not kill dcli when one is failing , execute all the one that work
cleanup the script message ouput, and only at the end mention manual action still required
sudo should cache to not ask 50 times
find package that have not precise enough def and ask user query
